abstract: The Ford Motor Company said on Monday that it was selling a climate-control unit to a joint venture between Valeo of France and V. Johnson Enterprises for an undisclosed price, completing Ford’s plan to sell off a collection of auto parts manufacturing businesses.
snippet: The Ford Motor Company said on Monday that it was selling a climate-control unit to a joint venture between Valeo of France and V. Johnson Enterprises for an undisclosed price, completing Ford’s plan to sell off a collection of auto parts manufact...
lead_paragraph: The Ford Motor Company said on Monday that it was selling a climate-control unit to a joint venture between Valeo of France and V. Johnson Enterprises, completing Ford’s plan to sell off a collection of auto parts manufacturing businesses.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
